main event: A civilian couple observed a glowing round object surrounded by mist or smoke while at a drive-in theater in Spartanburg, South Carolina on July 22, 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as glowing a dull red and was visible for 5 to 7 minutes., The couple noted that the object appeared to be about 200 feet in diameter and 2,000 feet in altitude., It seemed to pulse or flicker and was surrounded by a slight amount of smoke., Several other witnesses in Spartanburg also reported seeing the object., The report included articles from a local newspaper covering the sighting.
sighted object: glowing round object surrounded by mist or smoke
witness description: a civilian couple and other observers at the drive-in theater
